title: Population of Michigan , by race and ethnicity 2018
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories for the x axis representing Race, and a y axis representing Number of residents.
The highest category is found at White_alone where Number of residents is 7476047.0.
The lowest category is found at Native_Hawaiian_and_Other_Pacific_Islander_alone where Number of residents is 3290.0.
